alert.note: Alert for Christian; Logan; Macon; Marshall; McLean; Peoria; Sangamon; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 9:18AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A line of showers will bring a burst of strong winds to portions of south central Marshall, Logan, western Woodford, northwestern Christian, northeastern Sangamon, Tazewell, southwestern McLean, northeastern Peoria and west central Macon Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 913 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong winds along a line extending from near Spring Bay to near Edinburg. Movement was east at 35 mph. Wind gusts to 60 mph and locally higher can be expected. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong showers will be near... Spring Bay and Bay View Gardens around 920 AM CDT. Chillicothe, Germantown Hills and Rome around 925 AM CDT. Mount Auburn around 930 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Metamora. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 0 and 31. Interstate 474 between mile markers 9 and 14. Interstate 55 between mile markers 110 and 139. Interstate 72 between mile markers 108 and 126. Interstate 74 between mile markers 89 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Logan; Macon; Marshall; McLean; Peoria; Sangamon; Tazewell; Woodford
